mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (member_id, login_id, password, nickname, gender, birthdate) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER.NEXTVAL, #{loginId}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{gender}, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(#{birthdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.select: SELECT count(login_id) FROM MEMBER WHERE login_id = #{loginId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT count(nickname) FROM MEMBER WHERE nickname = #{nickname} AND deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT member_id, login_id, password, nickname, point, gender, birthDate, created_at, deleted_at FROM MEMBER WHERE login_id = #{loginId} AND deleted_at IS NULL

SELECT CASE WHEN type = 1 THEN '사용' WHEN type = 2 THEN '적립' END AS type, amount, description, TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS created_at FROM POINT_HISTORY WHERE member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT P.post_id, C.image_url, P.recommend_count, P.reply_count, P.rank, P.created_at FROM POST P LEFT JOIN COORDINATION C ON P.coordination_id = C.coordination_id LEFT JOIN REPLY R ON P.post_id = R.post_id AND R.deleted_at IS NULL WHERE P.deleted_at IS NULL AND P.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY
P.created_at DESC
P.recommend_count DESC
